mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, title AS title, content AS content, image_url AS imageUrl, thumbnail AS thumbnail, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, like_count AS likeCount FROM posts WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, title AS title, content AS content, image_url AS imageUrl, thumbnail AS thumbnail, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, like_count AS likeCount FROM posts WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (user_id, title, content, image_url, thumbnail, created_at, updated_at, like_count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{thumbnail}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
